definition: variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The windings should be cleaned and dried, and reimpregnated if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 绕组应清洁并干燥，如有必要重新侵漆。

sentences.english: The degaussing windings of the system have different configurations.
sentences.chinese: 消磁系统之消磁绕组的组成方式有多种。

sentences.english: The terminals of the rotor winding are connected to three slip rings.
sentences.chinese: 转子绕组的各端与三个滑环连接。

sentences.english: In using, the secondary winding can not be short-circuited or operating over-load.
sentences.chinese: 使用时二次绕组不能短路及超负荷运行。

sentences.english: If the filament transformer has a center tap, don't use it.
sentences.chinese: 如果变压器灯丝绕组有抽头，请不要使用它。

sentences.english: Clean off the dust in the windings before reassembling.
sentences.chinese: 在重新组装前请清除掉绕组中的灰尘。

sentences.english: Repair after winding, it must re-create a new mask sets and the closure plate.
sentences.chinese: 修复绕组后，又必须重新制作新的屏蔽套和封板。
单极控制器需要中心抽头绕组。

sentences.english: Armature manufacture and design of 6-layers-serials printed circuit motor is introduced here.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了六层印制绕组电机电枢的设计与的制作。

sentences.english: Have probed into its stator of windings and rotor winding design method.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了其定子绕组和转子绕组的设计方法。

sentences.english: Have probed into its stator of windings and rotor winding design method.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了其定子绕组和转子绕组的设计方法。

sentences.english: Windings should be dried in a drying oven.
sentences.chinese: 应将线圈绕组放入烘干箱中烘干。

sentences.english: The temperature sensing element type WZC copper resistance is a wire winding.
sentences.chinese: 型铜电阻的感温元件是一个铜丝绕组。

sentences.english: To guarantee the manufacturing process quality of power equipment, it is necessary to braze the winding bars reliably and efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 电力设备在制造工艺中要求对绕组铜排接头可靠焊接。

sentences.english: The stator winding must be impregnated with insulation paint and dried before refitting.
sentences.chinese: 定子绕组在重新安装前必须侵绝缘漆和烘干。

sentences.english: The secondary was sandwiched between the two primary sections.
sentences.chinese: 次级绕组采用三明治绕法夹在两个初级绕组之间。

definition: rating (for power output, flame resistance etc)
